Hi All;

First of all thanks to everyone who has replied my question.

@Jam=
es Abley : We are using Cruise control and i had seen a test results link o=
n the build results page. But the building operation is under teh control o=
f another team. So i jut want to test it locally on my local projects.

I t=
hink the best way is to use ant task. Is there more sample pages on the int=
ernet i can inspect. The reason of my question was : I am unfamiliar with a=
nt. But I think it is the right time to learn it.

I have also said that we=
 are using SOA architecture. So it makes unit testing harder for me. Becaus=
e i was unable to get the coverage with emma. Years years ago an underlying=
 architecture was build and we are still using it.

As an example: We have =
method like listBankElemnts() and is registred as BANK_LIST_ELEMENTS servic=
e.

So the underlying mechanism calls listBankElements method when ve call =
BANK_LIST_ELEMENTS with a refernce call mechanism. So emma can not cover li=
stBankElemnts method. And this causes a very very low coverage. Is there a =
possibility that we can also not get the list of metods within our html rep=
ort that were called by the SOA service names?

Yours.


 
=A9brahim DEM=A9=
